Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

Hunter Hunter

Hunter, hunter ⁠— I hunt for one like thee Hunter, hunter ⁠— why have you wounded me? Hunter, hunter ⁠— so strong and fair You surpass Eros in dread accuracy

Hunter, hunter ⁠— where are your painless arrows? Hunter, hunter ⁠— I dream to hunt for gallows Hunter, hunter ⁠— of wild lands The hunt has hunted me through straits and narrows

Hunter, hunter ⁠— can you find my path? Hunter, hunter ⁠— through woods and thorns Hunter, hunter ⁠— of the silver moon a stag implores you gut by its own horns

Paging
